sentences.en: a rare opportunity to see inside this historic building
sentences.cn: 参观这栋历史建筑内部的难得机会

sentences.en: Diana is taking the opportunity to wrap up the family presents.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜利用这个机会将家人的礼物包起来。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: He grabbed at the opportunity to buy his castle.
sentences.cn: 他抓住机会买下了他的城堡。

sentences.en: Here is your opportunity to acquire a luxurious one bedroom home.
sentences.cn: 现在正是购买一套豪华一居室住房的机会。

sentences.en: His opportunity to re-establish himself had been nobbled by the manager's tactics.
sentences.cn: 他重新树立自己地位的机会因教练的战术而流产了。

sentences.en: If you don't do it soon you're going to lose the opportunity.
sentences.cn: 不赶紧行动就没机会了。

sentences.en: It'san exciting opportunity to learn what goes on behind the scenes.
sentences.cn: 可以有机会了解幕后的工作，令人非常兴奋。

sentences.en: Laura flits about New York hailing taxis at every opportunity.
sentences.cn: 劳拉穿梭于纽约各处，一有机会就打车。

sentences.en: Let's not waste an opportunity to see the children.
sentences.cn: 咱们别错过了看孩子们的机会。

sentences.en: Offshoring provides an opportunity to obtain I.T. services at low cost.
sentences.cn: 离岸外包提供了以低成本获得信息技术服务的机会。

sentences.en: Take the opportunity to plunge yourself into your career.
sentences.cn: 抓住机会投身到事业中去。

sentences.en: The king said there was now a window of opportunity for peace.
sentences.cn: 国王说现在有寻求和平的短暂机会。

sentences.en: The opportunity had gone. His mind scrabbled for alternatives.
sentences.cn: 机会已经失去。他苦苦思索别的方案。

sentences.en: The owners don't want to overlook any opportunity to make a buck.
sentences.cn: 老板们不想错过任何可以赚钱的机会。

sentences.en: Their colleagues insulted them whenever the opportunity presented itself.
sentences.cn: 一有机会，同事们就会侮辱他们。

sentences.en: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.cn: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。
